overview: The film is on a social issue of the problems faced by a differently abled child and the way he overcome it. The film also promotes the alternative therapies of India. The film has won 12 awards in 5 National and International film festivals. â€œMacha Do Bawandar Macha Do" gives a message to the world that Will Power, Patience, Perseverance, and the Determination of a differently-abled person can change his or her destiny.
title: Macha Do Bawandar Macha Do
